headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Truffade Nero
content: Truffade’s latest offering is so exclusive you’ll have to pass a background check just to prove you’re corrupt and degenerate enough to own one. This thing will take a 100 octane dump on any supercar that dares to occupy the same garage and then wipe its ass on the leather seats – and that’s before you’ve seen what Benny can do with it.
